SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventEmitter, Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable, EventEmitter
Main class for managing the state and flow of the game. This class encapsulates all the essential components like players, decks, game state, and other dynamic elements that change throughout the game. It implements Serializable for object serialization, supporting saving and loading game states, and EventEmitter for event handling to manage game-related events dynamically.
See Also:

      NotYourTurnException - if it's not the player's turn.
